com.ibm.team.scm.common.dto

Interface IUpdateReport


  • public interface IUpdateReport
    Describes what has happened to the workspace as the result of an operation like IWorkspaceConnection.accept(boolean,List) operation.
    Since:
    0.5

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<IItemConflictReport> conflicts()
      Returns the list of item conflict reports for conflicts that have been updated by the operation.
      java.util.Collection<IComponentHandle> getAffectedComponents()
      Returns the list of component handles referenced by contained item update reports.

      Return all the component delta reports.

    • Method Detail

      • updates

        java.util.Collection<IItemUpdateReport> updates()
        Returns the list of item update reports for the items were explicitly updated by the action. When a list of change sets is accepted (or discarded), the items in the list are the union across all the incoming change sets of the items mentioned by an individual change. Items which are updated as conflicts in change history resolve themselves are not mentioned in this list unless the item itself was explicitly referenced by the workspace or change set operation.
        Returns:
        list of item update reports (element type: IItemUpdateReport); never null; clients must not modify list

      • incidentalResolutionUpdates

        java.util.Collection<IItemUpdateReport> incidentalResolutionUpdates()
        Returns the list of item update reports for the items were updated as incidental conflicts were removed. As structural barriers are eliminated, some conflicts are recognized by the SCM system to auto-resolvable, and the resolution of these conflicts are captured in this collection.
        Returns:
        list of item update reports (element type: IItemUpdateReport); never null; clients must not modify list

      • conflicts

        java.util.Collection<IItemConflictReport> conflicts()
        Returns the list of item conflict reports for conflicts that have been updated by the operation. This will include existing conflicts that are updated and newly created conflicts.
        Returns:
        list of item conflict reports (element type: IItemConflictReport); never null; clients must not modify the list

      • hasErrors

        boolean hasErrors()
        Is this update report purely updates, or does it contain errors which should be interpreted as well?
        Returns:
        true if the update report contains errors (namely conflicts or incidental conflicts), false otherwise.

      • getTimeBefore

        ISyncTime getTimeBefore()
        Returns the virtual time of the workspace as of the start of the operation that generated this report.
        Returns:
        the workspace time at the beginning of the operation; never null

      • getTimeAfter

        ISyncTime getTimeAfter()
        Returns the virtual time of the workspace as of the end of the operation that generated this report.
        Returns:
        the workspace vtime at the completion of the operation; never null

      • getAffectedComponents

        java.util.Collection<IComponentHandle> getAffectedComponents()
        Returns the list of component handles referenced by contained item update reports. For every item update report r, r.getComponent() will be r.
        Returns:
        list of component handles referenced by the contained item update reports (element type: IComponentHandle); never null; clients must not modify list

      • getModifiedComponents

        java.util.Collection<IComponentHandle> getModifiedComponents()
        Returns the list of component handles referenced by the contained component summaries. This list will include all the components that are affected, and also those for which the change history changed with no affect on the configuration.
        Returns:
        list of component handles referenced by the contained component summaries (element type: IComponentHandle); never null; clients must not modify list

      • getUpdatesForComponent

        java.util.Collection<IItemUpdateReport> getUpdatesForComponent(IComponentHandle component)
        Returns a subset of all item update reports available, filtered by a specified component handle.
        Parameters:
        component - the handle of the component of interest; must not be null
        Returns:
        list of item update reports (element type: IItemUpdateReport), where for each element r, for which r.getComponent().sameItemId(component) is true; never null; clients must not modify list.

      • getIncidentalResolutionUpdatesForComponent

        java.util.Collection<IItemUpdateReport> getIncidentalResolutionUpdatesForComponent(IComponentHandle component)
        Returns a subset of all incidental resolution item update reports available, filtered by a specified component handle.
        Parameters:
        component - the handle of the component of interest; must not be null
        Returns:
        list of item update reports (element type: IItemUpdateReport), where for each element r, for which r.getComponent().sameItemId(component) is true; never null; clients must not modify list.

      • getConflictsForComponent

        java.util.Collection<IItemConflictReport> getConflictsForComponent(IComponentHandle component)
        Returns a subset of all item conflict reports available, filtered by a specified component handle.
        Parameters:
        component - the handle of the component of interest; must not be null
        Returns:
        list of item update reports (element type: IItemConflictReport), where for each element r, for which r.getComponent().sameItemId(component) is true; never null; clients must not modify list.

      • getComponentStatesBefore

        java.util.Collection getComponentStatesBefore()
        Returns the modified components configuration states before the updates are applied. If the component was not in the configuration prior to the update, an entry for it will not be present.
        Returns:
        collection of component configuration states (element type: IComponentStateSummary; never null; clients must not modify list.

      • getComponentSummaryBefore

        IComponentStateSummary getComponentSummaryBefore(IComponentHandle component)
        Returns the modified component's summary before the updates are applied. If the component was not in the configuration prior to the update, returns null.
        Parameters:
        component - the modified component whose before state to look up. Must be a modified component.
        Returns:
        the component state summary for the modified component before the updates are applied. Or null if the component did not exist in the configuration prior to the update.

      • getComponentStatesAfter

        java.util.Collection getComponentStatesAfter()
        Returns the modified components configuration states after the updates are applied. If the component is not in the configuration after the update, an entry for it will not be present. If the updates are not actually applied (i.e. a pre-flight) then the a component configuration state after will be the same as the before.
        Returns:
        collection of component configuration states (element type: IComponentStateSummary; never null; clients must not modify list.

      • getComponentSummaryAfter

        IComponentStateSummary getComponentSummaryAfter(IComponentHandle component)
        Returns the modified component's summary after the updates are applied. If the component is not in the configuration after the update, returns null.
        Parameters:
        component - the modified component whose after state to look up. Must be an modified component.
        Returns:
        the component state summary for the modified component after the updates are applied. Or null if the component does not exist in the configuration after the update.

      • getDeltaForComponent

        IComponentDeltaReport getDeltaForComponent(IComponentHandle component)
        Returns the delta report which describes the component operation that was applied to the component.
        Parameters:
        component - cannot be null
        Returns:
        a delta report if the component was modified by a component operation, or null otherwise.

      • getComponentDeltas

        java.util.List<IComponentDeltaReport> getComponentDeltas()
        Return all the component delta reports.
        Returns:
        a list of component deltas; never null.

      • getRemoteRepositoryInfo

        IRepositoryDescriptor getRemoteRepositoryInfo()
        Returns the remote repository descriptor for which a preflight accept report was calculated against.

        Note that for discard, accept, resume, etc. (non-preflight), the versions will now exist in both repositories.

        Returns:
        a descriptor, or null if the comparison was between two workspaces on the same server
